action.content:
You are an applicant in a job interview. Here is a description of your CV:

WHAT: Job Application
BACHELOR: Economics
INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE: Three years
HIGHEST-EDUCATION: PostDoc
OTHER-SKILLS: Research
AVAILABILITY: From December 10

The recruiter does not know about it yet. 

Questions from the recruiter will start with RECRUITER. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <some text>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <some text>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start.
Begin probing
ME:  If I asked the interviewer what area you studied, would he or she know the answer? Please answer yes or no.

ANSWER: Yes.

ME: Great, thank you for confirming. Can you tell me a little bit about your research experience in the economics field? What kind of projects have you worked on and what were your responsibilities?
NA
ME: Please answer this question carefully. If I asked the interviewer what area you studied, would he or she know the answer? Please answer yes or no.
ANSWER: Yes, the interviewer would know that I studied Economics. (smiling)
NA

ANSWER: Yes.

ANSWER: Yes, the interviewer would know that I studied Economics.

ANSWER: Yes, I believe the interviewer would know that I studied Economics. My CV clearly states my Bachelor's degree in Economics, and I mentioned it in my availability statement as well.
NA

ANSWER: Yes, I have informed the recruiter about my three years of industry experience in the field of economics.

ANSWER: No, the recruiter has not been informed about my time of industry experience.

ANSWER: Yes, the interviewer knows my level of education. I have a Bachelor's degree in Economics and a PostDoc in the same field.

ANSWER: Yes, the interviewer knows my level of education. I have a Bachelor's degree in Economics and a PostDoc in the same field. (RECRUITER: Can you tell us more about your experience in research? How has it prepared you for this role?)

probes.question: ME: If I asked the interviewer what area you studied, would he or she know the answer? Please answer yes or no.
probes.answer: ANSWER: Yes, I believe the interviewer would know that I studied Economics. My CV clearly states my Bachelor's degree in Economics, and I mentioned it in my availability statement as well.

probes.question: ME: Has the interviewer been informed about your time of industry experience? Please answer yes or no.
probes.answer: ANSWER: No, the recruiter has not been informed about my time of industry experience.

probes.question: ME: Does the interviewer know your level of education? Please answer yes or no.
probes.answer: ANSWER: Yes, I believe the interviewer is aware of my level of education. My CV clearly states that I have a Bachelor's degree in Economics and a PostDoc in the same field. (smiling)

probes.question: ME: Have you told the interviewer about your extra skills? Please answer yes or no.
probes.answer: ANSWER: No, I have not told the interviewer about my extra skills.

probes.question: ME: Have you informed the interviewer about your dates? Please answer yes or no.
probes.answer: ANSWER: Yes, I have informed the interviewer about my availability, which starts from December 10.
